name: Berlin
quote: The second any blood is shed, we’ll no longer be Robin Hood, but just a bunch of plain motherf***ing punks.

name: Tokyo
quote: In the end, love is a good reason for everything to fall apart.

name: Rio
quote: We are not murderers, we are just robbers.

name: Denver
quote: You don’t love them because you are used to them, you love them because you’re used to loving them.
